description: This source file contains the implementation of the AuthService class, responsible for handling user authentication, token creation, registration, and login functionalities within the FrndAppBackend project. It also defines JwtSettings for JWT configuration.

classes.name: JwtSettings
classes.description: Holds JWT configuration details such as issuer, audience, signing key, and expiration time, bound from configuration.

classes.name: AuthService
classes.description: Provides authentication services including token creation, user registration, and login logic.

methods.name: CreateToken
methods.description: Generates a JWT token for a given user summary, including claims such as user ID, username, and email.

methods.name: RegisterAsync
methods.description: Registers a new user if email and username are not already taken, hashes the password, saves the user, and returns an auth response with a token.

methods.name: LoginAsync
methods.description: Authenticates a user based on email/username and password, and returns an auth response with a token upon success.
